name: Gnome
description:
You're taking care of your friend's house while they're away. You need to keep everything tidy and water the plants, but a clay garden gnome suddenly appears.

Things get a little unusual after that.

Features:

  • Water the garden, get rid of weeds and more while watching over the house.
  • Both night and day settings. (And possibly more.)
  • Deal with Darry the Gnome who will appear without notice.
  • Eerie atmosphere and scares.
  • High definition lighting and effects.
  • Piece together the mystery as the days progress, offering something new.
  • Play at night with full sound capabilities for maximum immersion.

It's like an interactive scary movie.
